title: Armed to the Teeth
description: In addition to your other weapons, you get one serious weapon and two handy weapons.

title: Bug Out (+Aggro)
description: Name your escape route and roll+Aggro.

outcomes.text: You can go or stay, but if you go it costs you: leave something behind, or take something with you, the MC will tell you what.
You're caught vulnerable, half in and half out.

title: Dangerous Presence (+Aggro)
description: When you enter into a nonviolent situation, roll+Aggro.

bullets: If I have any enemies here, they put their hands to their weapons. Ask the MC who does.
If I have any enemies here, they freeze and try to make themselves inconspicuous. Ask the MC who does.
If anybody here wants or needs my help, even if they don't dare signal me, they look relieved to see me. Ask the MC who does.
If I have any allies here, they make eye contact with me. Ask the MC who does.

outcomes.text: If you have any enemies here, they immediately move against you.

title: Hold Your Own
description: In battle, you're able to go toe-to-toe with a small gang by yourself. When you're outnumbered, count yourself as a gang of 10.

title: Visions of Death (+Weird)
description: When you go into battle, roll+Weird.

outcomes.text: Name one person who'll die and one who'll live. Don't name a player's character; name NPCs only. The MC will make your vision come true, if it's possible.
Name one person who'll die OR one person who'll live.
You foresee your own death, and accordingly take -1 throughout the battle.

title: Serious Weapons
pickOne: **Handmade gatling gun** (*4-harm, area, close-far, harness, loud, salvos: 3*)
**Scoped sniper rifle** (*4-harm, far, hi-tech, loud, ammo: 6*)

title: Handy Weapons
pickOne: **Spare ammo** (*Add 5/3/3 to ammo tracks of your choice*)

title: Improvements
description: Choose 2 Volatile moves. At 6Xp, choose an improvement and erase.
pick: Get a move from an unused playbook
Get a move from an unused playbook
